## data

```{r data}
dat<-lung %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  data.frame()
```

##ddd

```{r}
set.seed(1119)
q1<-dat[sample(nrow(dat))[1:55],]
q2<-dat[sample(nrow(dat))[56:111],]
q3<-dat[sample(nrow(dat))[112:167],]
train1 <- rbind(q1,q2)
test1 <- q3
train2 <- rbind(q2,q3)
test2 <- q1
train3 <- rbind(q1,q3)
test3 <- q2
```

## MODEL.1

```{r}
#1st
tet <- NULL
for (i in 4:10) {
  a <- coxph(Surv(time,status==2)~train1[,i],data = train1)
  tet <- rbind(tet,data.frame(value = summary(a)$coefficients[5],name = colnames(train1)[i]))
}

#2nd
for (i in c(4,6:10)) {
  a <- coxph(Surv(time,status==2)~sex+train1[,i],data = train1)
  print(paste0("i=",colnames(train1)[i]))
  print(summary(a))
}

#3rd
for (i in c(4,6,7,9,10)) {
  a <- coxph(Surv(time,status==2)~sex+pat.karno+train1[,i],data = train1)
  print(paste0("i=",colnames(train1)[i]))
  print(summary(a))
}
```

## Cox regression

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
full_model <- coxph(Surv(time,status==2)~.,data = dat)
summary(full_model)
pcox_step <-step(full_model,direction = "both",trace = 0)
pcox_step
```

##그래프

```{r}
ggsurvplot(survfit(Surv(time,status==2)~.,data=dat),
           palette = "#2E9FDF",
           risk.table = "nrisk_cumevents",
           xlab = "Time(days)",
           cumevents = TRUE,
           linetype = 1,
           tables.height = 0.2,
           surv.median.line = "hv",
           legend = "none")
```

##propotional hazard 가정
`Proportional hazard 가정 (H0:비례위험 가정을 만족한다.)`

```{r}
cox.zph(pcox_step)
#p-value가 0.05이상이므로 H0 기각불가
```
